Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS11RESTElement.name: RESTElement
Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS11RESTElement.abstract: defines an element that can be handled over a REST property wrapper

Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS10Filterablea.name: Filterable
Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS10Filterablea.abstract: defines an element that can be filtered with a REST property wrapper

Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS8Sortablea.name: Sortable
Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS8Sortablea.abstract: defines an element that can be sorted with a REST property wrapper

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:6ELBRUS11Cre.name: init(userName:password:)
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:6ELBRUS11Cre.abstract: The init for the initialization of a Credential consisting of a user name and a password.

Structs/Credentials.html.name: Credentials
Structs/Credentials.html.abstract: The Credentials offer the possibility to declare a user name and password for a basic authentication.

Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.name: authorization
Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.abstract: the variable that holds the authorization method

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: Element
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: specifies the data structure that will be stored

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: wrappedValue
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: defines the data that will be stored

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: storagePath
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: defines a String that characterizes the unique attributes of the wrappedValue

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: localStorageURL
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: URL of the parent folder to store the variable in

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: loadFromFile()
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: Load an array of LocalFileStorables from a file

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: saveToFile(_:)
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: Save a collection of LocalFileStorables to a file

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html.name: LocalFileStorable
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html.abstract: an object that can be represented and stored as a local file

Protocols/NetworkHandler.html.name: NetworkHandler
Protocols/NetworkHandler.html.abstract: Defines a protocol to represent all the network functionality that is used to communicate with a RESTful service, the encoding/decoding strategy, the different network requests (get, post, put, delete) and the authorization method.

Functions.html#/s:6ELBRUS27defaultFilter.name: defaultFilterServerStrategy(_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:6ELBRUS27defaultFilter.abstract: This is the default filter server strategy oriented at the LHS Brackets structure from https://www.moesif.com/blog/technical/api-design/REST-API-Design-Filtering-Sorting-and-Pagination/#lhs-brackets .

Extensions/Never.html#/s:s5NeverO6ELBRUS.name: reflectDecoded()
Extensions/Never.html#/s:s5NeverO6ELBRUS.abstract: default method, fails directly if it is called

Extensions/Never.html#/s:s5NeverO6ELBRUS.name: init(from:)
Extensions/Never.html#/s:s5NeverO6ELBRUS.abstract: default method, fails directly if it is called

Extensions/Never.html#/s:s5NeverO6ELBRUS.name: init(_:)
Extensions/Never.html#/s:s5NeverO6ELBRUS.abstract: default method, fails directly if it is called

Extensions/Never.html#/s:s5NeverO6ELBRUS.name: description
Extensions/Never.html#/s:s5NeverO6ELBRUS.abstract: default method, fails directly if it is called

Extensions/Never.html#/s:s5NeverO6ELBRUS.name: encode(to:)
Extensions/Never.html#/s:s5NeverO6ELBRUS.abstract: default method, fails directly if it is called

Extensions/Never.html.name: Never
Extensions/Never.html.abstract: An extension to Never to enable an initialization of a property wrapper without a filter and/or sort strategy to not specifiy the generic types

Enums/SortStrategy/Sorter/Direction.html.name: Direction
Enums/SortStrategy/Sorter/Direction.html.abstract: specifies the direction of sorting, ascending (.asc) or descending (.desc)

Enums/SortStrategy/Sorter.html#/s:6ELBRU.name: init(direction:property:)
Enums/SortStrategy/Sorter.html#/s:6ELBRU.abstract: The init initializes the Sorter with the Direction of sorting and the Property that is used to sort the data.

Enums/SortStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS12Sort.name: server(_:_:)
Enums/SortStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS12Sort.abstract: specifies that the sorting process is realized through a server route; the user has the option to specify an own translation function in the case

Enums/SortStrategy/Sorter.html.name: Sorter
Enums/SortStrategy/Sorter.html.abstract: describes a Sorter with a Direction (ascending, descending), the property as a KeyPath to the later sorted variable of a class

Enums/FilterStrategy/Filter/Operation.ht.name: Operation
Enums/FilterStrategy/Filter/Operation.ht.abstract: specifies the filter operation with the possible options of less equal (.lte), greater equal (.gte) and equal (.exists)

Enums/FilterStrategy/Filter.html#/s:6ELB.name: init(operations:)
Enums/FilterStrategy/Filter.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: init to initialize a Filter with the Operations that define the FilterStrategy

Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.name: server(_:_:)
Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.abstract: specifies that the filter process is realized through a server route; the user has the option to specify an own translation function in the case

Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.name: client(_:)
Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.abstract: specifies that the filter process is realized through the REST property wrapper locally by the client.

Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.name: none
Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.abstract: specfies that filtering is not wanted and the default case.

Enums/FilterStrategy/Filter.html.name: Filter
Enums/FilterStrategy/Filter.html.abstract: represents a filter that takes a generic RESTElement and Filterable element to perform the operations: greater equal, less equal and exists, with the possibility to have more than one filter operation

Enums/TokenType.html#/s:6ELBRUS9TokenTyp.name: description
Enums/TokenType.html#/s:6ELBRUS9TokenTyp.abstract: description variable returns a String representation of the two token types

Enums/PasswordType.html#/s:6ELBRUS12Pass.name: description
Enums/PasswordType.html#/s:6ELBRUS12Pass.abstract: description variable is used for a string representation of the Base64 encoding of the credentials.

Enums/Authorization.html#/s:6ELBRUS13Aut.name: credentials(type:)
Enums/Authorization.html#/s:6ELBRUS13Aut.abstract: describes an authentication over a basic authentication

Enums/PasswordType.html.name: PasswordType
Enums/PasswordType.html.abstract: PasswordType implements the Base64 encoding of the credentials.

Enums/TokenType.html.name: TokenType
Enums/TokenType.html.abstract: TokenType is used for token authentication over a bearer token or a custom defined token.

Enums/FilterStrategy.html.name: FilterStrategy
Enums/FilterStrategy.html.abstract: represents the filter strategy with the different options client, server and none filter

Enums/SortStrategy.html.name: SortStrategy
Enums/SortStrategy.html.abstract: represents possible sorting strategies on the server, client or none strategy

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC11stor.name: storagePath
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC11stor.abstract: storagePath specifies the appendix of the storage location in the caching process.

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC_14fil.name: init(_:filterStrategy:sortStrategy:caching:)
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC_14fil.abstract: init is used for the configuration of the data synchronization, to specifiy the RESTful service address with the network service, optional filtering, sorting, and caching.

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC12wrap.name: wrappedValue
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC12wrap.abstract: The wrappedValue is the observed data structure and represents the connected data. This data will be synchronized with the RESTful service.

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.name: init(_:sortStrategy:caching:)
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.abstract: In the case that filtering is not needed, the generic Filterable type will be inferred as Never

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.name: init(_:filterStrategy:caching:)
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.abstract: In the case that sorting is not needed, the generic Sortable type will be inferred as Never

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.name: init(_:caching:)
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.abstract: In the case that filtering and sorting is not needed, the generic Filterable and Sortable types will be both inferred as Never

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.name: init(encoder:decoder:authorization:)
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.abstract: initialization of the URLSessionNetworkHandler with .none as default Authorization variable

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.name: put(_:on:)
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.abstract: performs a PUT request on the specified URL and replaces the element located on the URL with the Element that is passed in

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.name: get(on:)
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.abstract: performs a GET request on the specified URL

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.name: post(_:on:)
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.abstract: performs a POST request on the specified URL

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.name: delete(at:)
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.abstract: performs a DELETE request on the specified URL

Classes/JSONService.html#/s:6ELBRUS11JSO.name: init(url:)
Classes/JSONService.html#/s:6ELBRUS11JSO.abstract: initializes the Service with a pre-specified URL and the URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler

Classes/Service.html#/s:6ELBRUS7ServiceC.name: init(url:networkHandler:filterServerStrategy:sortServerStrategy:)
Classes/Service.html#/s:6ELBRUS7ServiceC.abstract: With the init of the Service, a user specifies the RESTful service addressed through a URL. The NetworkHandleris used for the network communication. The user has the possibility to set a global filter or sort strategy on the server-side with specifying a function for the translation of the strategy to a URLQueryItem.

Classes/Service.html.name: Service
Classes/Service.html.abstract: Service represents the service that holds all the network functionality, offers configuration to the filter and sort query creation and stores the RESTful service address to perform the network requests

Classes/JSONService.html.name: JSONService
Classes/JSONService.html.abstract: JSONService provides an initialization of a Service with a URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler that uses JSON as encoding and decoding strategy

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html.name: URLSessionNetworkHandler
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html.abstract: URLSessionNetworkHandler conforms to the NetworkHandler protocol and represents an implementation of the different network requests

Classes/URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler.htm.name: URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler
Classes/URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler.htm.abstract: The URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler is a specialized version of URLSessionNetworkHandler that uses JSON as encoding and decoding strategy.

Classes/REST.html.name: REST
Classes/REST.html.abstract: The property wrapper is used for automatic observation of a connected data structure that is automatically synchronized with the specified RESTful service in the Service variable. Filtering, Sorting or Caching the data structure is optional and can be configured with the initialization.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
